name: Summer Battle
description:
Made for Playmakers Summertime Game Jam 2022

Chosen Theme: Summertime

By Tam, Quang, and Khang

[CONTROLS]

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move character

Mouse - Aim and shoot

Space - Dash

[Story]

On a hot summer beach, a lifeguard named Johnsey was enjoying his day. Until suddenly, the Sun fell from the sky and crashed onto the beach. As a part of his lifeguard duty, he must stop the Sun from destroying the beach.

[Tips]

  • Try to stay close. Your attacks don't reach far.
  • Most patterns require you to move in a circular motion.
  • Avoid running too far. It gets harder to read the bullets.
  • Easy mode is not actually easy. It's just easier than the other modes.

[Credits]
